.. meta::
   :description: Mergify Documentation for Badges
   :keywords: mergify, badges

.. _Badge:

=======
ðŸŽ– Badge
=======

Mergify offers badges that you can use in your project to inform contributors
that your repository is managed by Mergify.

The badge URL for a badge repository is::

  https://img.shields.io/endpoint.svg?url=https://gh.mergify.io/badges/<owner>/<repo>

``<owner>`` and ``<repo>`` are placeholders which have to be adapted to the
repository. For example:
``https://img.shields.io/endpoint.svg?url=https://gh.mergify.io/badges/mergifyio/mergify-engine&style=flat``
is a valid URL.


Embedding
---------

You can embed those badges by adding them to, e.g., your ``README`` files.

- In a ``README.md``, add:

.. code-block:: md

    [![Mergify Status][mergify-status]][mergify]

    [mergify]: https://mergify.io
    [mergify-status]: https://img.shields.io/endpoint.svg?url=https://gh.mergify.io/badges/<owner>/<repo>&style=flat


- In a ``README.rst``, add:

.. code-block:: rst

    .. image:: https://img.shields.io/endpoint.svg?url=https://gh.mergify.io/badges/<owner>/<repo>&style=flat
       :target: https://mergify.io
       :alt: Mergify Status


Styles
------

You can change the style of the badge by customizing the ``style=`` option at
the end of the URL. Here's the list of possible values:

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Style
     - Example
   * - ``flat``
     - |flat|
   * - ``flat-square``
     - |flat-square|
   * - ``plastic``
     - |plastic|
   * - ``for-the-badge``
     - |for-the-badge|
   * - ``social``
     - |social|

.. |flat| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Mergify-enabled-success.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,
.. |flat-square| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Mergify-enabled-success.svg?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,
.. |plastic| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Mergify-enabled-success.svg?style=plastic&logo=data:image/png;base64,
.. |for-the-badge| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Mergify-enabled-success.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,
.. |social| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Mergify-enabled-success.svg?style=social&logo=data:image/png;base64,
